metadata.title: CVE-2015-3008 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Asterisk Open Source 1.8 before 1.8.32.3, 11.x before 11.17.1, 12.x before12.8.2, and 13.x before 13.3.2 and Certified Asterisk 1.8.28 before1.8.28-cert5, 11.6 before 11.6-cert11, and 13.1 before 13.1-cert2, whenregistering a SIP TLS device, does not properly handle a null byte in adomain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of an X.509certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof arbitrarySSL servers via a crafted certificate issued by a legitimate CertificationAuthority.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
